trans-unit.source: Defines the behavior for an extender control.
trans-unit.target: Define o comportamento de um controlo de extensão.

trans-unit.source: Extender controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl> class require a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control to be on the page.
trans-unit.target: Os controlos de extensão que derivam a <xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl>classe requerem um <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>controlo na página.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl> base class performs an explicit test to make sure that a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control exists on the page.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl>classe base efetua um teste explícita para se certificar de que um <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>controlo existe na página.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to create extender controls and the page does not contain an <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control, you can create a class that implements the IExtenderControl interface directly.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se pretender criar a página e os controlos de extensão não contém um <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>controlo, pode criar uma classe que implementa a interface de IExtenderControl diretamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if you are creating a class that derives from <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> or you are extending an existing control that derives from <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>, you can implement the IExtenderControl interface to support client functionality.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, se estiver a criar uma classe que deriva de <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>ou estiver a expandir um controlo existente que deriva de <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>, pode implementar a interface IExtenderControl para suportar a funcionalidade de cliente.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: The IExtenderControl interface registers the script libraries for a control by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptReferences%2A> method, and it registers <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> objects by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptDescriptors%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A interface IExtenderControl regista as bibliotecas de script para um controlo ao chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptReferences%2A>regista o método e <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor>objetos ao chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptDescriptors%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptDescriptors%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> </xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptReferences%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptDescriptors%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> list of <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptDescriptors%2A>método devolve um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>lista de <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptDescriptors%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you extend an existing control type that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class, implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se expandir um tipo de controlo existente que é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>classe, implementar o <xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: To create an extender control by implementing IExtenderControl, you do the following: - Write code for the control's `OnInit` event to detect and use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control if it is available on the page.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um controlo de extensão implementando IExtenderControl, efetue o seguinte:-escrever código para o controlo `OnInit` eventos para detetar e utilizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>controlar se estiver disponível na página.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> is not available on the page, provide alternative means to register required scripts by calling static methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: -Se a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>não está disponível na página, fornecer alternativa significa registar os scripts necessários ao chamar os métodos estáticos para a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: - Provide protected virtual members for IExtenderControl members.
trans-unit.target: -Fornece membros virtuais protegidos para IExtenderControl membros.

trans-unit.source: - Provide instance script as a script block that you register with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: -Fornecer um script de instância como um bloco de script que registar com o <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: You must do this during the control's `PreRender`, `PreRenderComplete`, or `Render` events.
trans-unit.target: Deve fazê-lo durante o controlo `PreRender`, `PreRenderComplete`, ou `Render` eventos.

trans-unit.source: - Register the script descriptors during the control's `Render` event.
trans-unit.target: -Registar os descritores de script durante o controlo `Render` eventos.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the page contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control, the page must contain a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se a página contém uma <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>controlo, a página tem de conter um <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: You must implement the IExtenderControl interface only when the page does not contain a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Tem de implementar a interface IExtenderControl apenas quando a página não contém um <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: Registers the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects for the control and returns an object that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects for the control.
trans-unit.target: Regista o <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"> </xref> objetos para o controlo e devolve um objeto que contém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"> </xref> objetos para o controlo.

trans-unit.source: The server control that the extender is associated with.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de servidor que está associado a extensão.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection that contains <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>coleção que contenha <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"> </xref> objetos.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Registers the script libraries for the control and returns an enumeration of ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.
trans-unit.target: Regista as bibliotecas de script para o controlo e devolve uma enumeração de ficheiros de ECMAScript (JavaScript) que foram registados como recursos incorporados.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection that contains JavaScript files that have been registered as embedded resources.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>coleção que contém ficheiros de JavaScript que foram registados como os recursos incorporados.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>
